allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Docker build and add environment-based CORS configuration

- Update poetry install to use --only main instead of deprecated --no-dev
- Add system dependencies for OpenCV \(libgl1, libglib2.0-0, libxcb1\)
- Add APP_ENV variable for dev/production configuration
- Implement environment-based CORS origins \(localhost for dev, smartquery.app for prod\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
